thread.title: Women Who Will Make You Want To Get Sisterlocks ASAP
thread.title_full: Women Who Will Make You Want To Get Sisterlocks ASAP

author: Victoria Uwumarogie
title: Women Who Will Make You Want To Get Sisterlocks ASAP
text: https://www.instagram.com/p/BOj8yEXjhss/?taken-by=sumlocks While everyone loves to behold the sight of a head full of locs of all sizes and lengths, a type of loc that deserves more time in the spotlight is the Sisterlock. Granted, installing Sisterlocks is quite expensive when compared to the initial installation of regular locs and that may be the reason more people aren't diving at the chance to have them just yet. (When I was trying to figure out what to do with my hair before I started my locs, I was given an estimate of $500 by a consultant just to start Sisterlocks--that didn't include the cost of future retightenings.) But those who do have the tiny but full and naturally coiled style look absolutely amazing in them. If you're looking for a possible new style, or like me, you just like to stare at natural hair on Instagram for hours, check out women with Sisterlocks who might make you want to get locked up. https://www.instagram.com/p/BLWpBy-hz6D/?tagged=sisterlocs&hl=en
